markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Breath Like Honey](/Feats.aspx?ID=5604) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kholo" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=758" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 19 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Sweetbreath Kholo](/Heritages.aspx?ID=330) heritage

</column>

---

You smell of honey and savory things. Your circumstance bonus to checks to [Make an Impression](/Actions.aspx?ID=2392) if the target can smell your breath increases to +2. In addition, you can cast [_enthrall_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1516) as a 3rd-rank occult innate spell once per day, except the spell has a range of 30 feet and the [olfactory](/Traits.aspx?ID=664) trait instead of the [auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=541) trait. Targets don't gain any circumstance bonus for disagreeing with you.
name: Breath Like Honey

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 9" pfs="Standard" > Breath Like Honey Source Player Core 2 pg. 19 1.1 Prerequisites Sweetbreath Kholo heritage --- You smell of honey and savory things. Your circumstance bonus to checks to Make an Impression if the target can smell your breath increases to +2. In addition, you can cast enthrall as a 3rd-rank occult innate spell once per day, except the spell has a range of 30 feet and the olfactory trait instead of the auditory trait. Targets don't gain any circumstance bonus for disagreeing with you.
